title: when does worlds pick'em icon arrives?
body:
I got around 50 and the icon's still not there :/
Should I wait for more days?

replies.body: I'm not sure why that's happening, but I'd try Incognito mode or [clearing your cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that might fix it.  You can also send us an email via support@riotgames.com if you can't access the ticketing system.  Hope that helps!

I think pick em icons have already been sent out.  If you have received yours yet, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Take a screenshot of your pick em page while logged in to help you out with this.  We'll respond as soon as we can!

oh hey thank you for your reply. Actually, I've faced another problem. Everytime I go into the link you wrote and log in to write a support ticket (they automatically logs me out when I get there Idk why this happens but when I get there I'm just logged out) , they just lead me  from (https://auth.riotgames.com/authorize?redirect_uri=https://login.support.riotgames.com/login_callback&client_id=player-support-zendesk&ui_locales=en-us%20en-us&response_type=code&scope=openid%20email) here to (https://login.support.riotgames.com/error?error_code=VALIDATION_FALSE)here. 
Even before I try to type something to log in :/ 
any solution for this or should I also ask this on support page?
